attacks.name: Turnaround Standby
attacks.effect: During your next turn, any damage done by Mawile's Swallow or Bite to your opponent's Active Pokémon is increased by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Swallow
attacks.effect: Remove from Mawile the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.
